translator_notes: 脂评 (Zhiping) refers to the commentary attributed to Zhiyan Zhai (脂砚斋) and other early readers from Cao Xueqin's circle, preserved in multiple manuscript sources
汇校本 indicates this is a collated edition combining commentary from multiple manuscript versions (甲戌本, 庚辰本, 己卯本, etc.)
Cao Xueqin (曹雪芹, c. 1715-1763) is the primary author of the first 80 chapters of Dream of the Red Chamber
Zhiyan Zhai (脂砚斋) is believed to be a close friend or family member of Cao Xueqin who added extensive commentary to early manuscripts
research_notes: Title page contains book title, author attribution, commentator attribution, and modern editor
The Zhiping commentary (脂评) is one of the most important sources for understanding the novel's hidden meanings and authorial intent
Multiple manuscript versions exist (甲戌本 from 1754, 庚辰本 from 1760, etc.), each with different commentary
This collated edition combines commentary from various sources, marked with tags like 【甲戌】【庚辰】throughout the text
